original_text: And he spoke kindly to him and gave him a seat above the seats of the kings who were with him in Babylon.
korean_text: 그에게 친절하게 말하고 그의 자리를 그와 함께 바벨론에 있는 왕들의 자리보다 높이고

sentences.original_text: And he spoke kindly to him
and gave him a seat above the seats of the kings
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그에게 왕들의 자리보다 높은 자리를 주었습니다

sentences.original_text: who were with him in Babylon
